snippet: The police on Friday arrested three men, who are suspected of being Irish Republican Army militants, in connection with the killing of an off-duty prison officer.
abstract: Police in Northern Ireland arrest three suspected Irish Republican Army militants in connection with the killing of an off-duty prison guard.
lead_paragraph: The police on Friday arrested three men, who are suspected of being Irish Republican Army militants, in connection with the killing of an off-duty prison officer.

headline.main: Police Arrest 3 Suspected in Prison Guard’s Killing in Northern Ireland
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland: Police Arrest 3 Suspected in Prison Guard’s Killing
